title: Bloomberg Markets: GE's Klee on `Innovation Point'

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ann R. Klee President GE Foundation Discussing General Electric's move to Boston and digital industrial transformation.
